title: Add Username Availability Check
description: Extend the registration form to check if a username is available in real-time as the user types, debouncing requests to avoid overwhelming the server.
instructions:
Add a username field to the registration form that:

1. Shows a loading indicator while checking availability
2. Debounces API calls (wait 500ms after user stops typing)
3. Shows a green checkmark when username is available
4. Shows a red X with error message when username is taken
5. Validates that username is 3-20 characters, alphanumeric with underscores only

Create the following:
- A debouncer utility class
- Username validation logic
- API call to check availability
- UI feedback for each state (loading, available, taken, invalid)

hints.text: Use Timer.cancel() to stop the previous timer before starting a new one in the debouncer.
Check if the widget is still mounted before calling setState after an async operation.
Use an enum to track all possible states: unchecked, checking, available, taken, and invalid format.
